_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Pavlov-Bot
author: unknown@unknown.com
description: A bot used for performing RCON commands over Discord.
startup: cd ~/pavlov-bot && python3 -m pipenv install && python3 -m pipenv run python run.py

installation.script:
apt update
DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends software-properties-common python3.8 python3-pip git

cd /mnt/server && git clone https://github.com/makupi/pavlov-bot
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
pip3 install pipenv
cd /mnt/server/pavlov-bot && pipenv install
